resources.string: Phone Call permission is needed to disconnect call.
Phone Call permission was denied. Please consider granting it in order to disconnect call!
Phone Call permission was denied with never ask again. You can still change this from setting menu.
Send SMS permission is needed to send SMS.
Send SMS permission was denied. Please consider granting it in order to send message!
Send SMS permission was denied with never ask again. You can still change this from setting menu.
